detail_desc: Blouse woven in an airy cotton blend with broderie anglaise, a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elasticated frill trims, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short top in soft, crinkled viscose jersey with a smocked, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and lace-trimmed seam at the top that continues over the shoulders. Short, elasticated puff sleeves and overlocked edges.

Short blouse in airy, pattern-weave cotton with inset lace sections and a V-neck front and back with a wide lace trim. Dropped shoulders and short raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short blouse in airy, pattern-weave cotton with inset lace sections and a V-neck front and back with a wide lace trim. Dropped shoulders and short raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in airy, pattern-weave cotton with inset lace sections and a V-neck front and back with a wide lace trim. Dropped shoulders and short raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Short dress in airy, pattern-weave cotton with inset lace sections and a V-neck front and back with a wide lace trim. Dropped shoulders and short raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Top woven in a cotton blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and wide, frill-trimmed smocking at the top. Seam at the waist and a flared peplum.
Top woven in a cotton blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and wide, frill-trimmed smocking at the top. Seam at the waist and a flared peplum.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with round toes, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Block heels 7 cm.
Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with embroidered sections, a V-neck, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Sleeveless, fitted dress in ribbed slub jersey with a V-neck front and back and decorative buttons down the front.
Sleeveless, fitted dress in ribbed slub jersey with a V-neck front and back and decorative buttons down the front.
Dance shoes in imitation leather with glittery elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.

Round shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and a zip at the top. One zipped outer compartment. Lined. Width 6 cm, diameter approx. 19.5 cm.

T-shirt in printed cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a double layer at the hem with short slits in the sides.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and heart-shaped press-stud. Straight cut to the hem.

Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede with D-rings.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck with a lace trim at the top and adjustable spaghetti straps.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and a zip fly and button. Straight cut to the hem.

Tuxedo trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, jetted back pockets and legs with satin side stripes. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
